TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ZoomMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the zoom mode for the ReportViewer control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This enumerator is used with the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewer.ZoomMode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ZoomMode FullPage = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to full page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ZoomMode PageWidth = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to page width.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ZoomMode Percent = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to a percentage.
